CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Innovation Beverage Group is a developer, manufacturer, marketer, exporter and retailer of a growing beverage portfolio of 60 formulations across 13 alcoholic and non-alcoholic brands for which we own exclusive manufacturing rights. Since its beginning in 2018 as Australian Boutique Spirits Pty Ltd, IBG has been a committed innovator within the beverage industry. Our focus is on premium and super premium brands. Our direct-to-consumer distribution channel is a network of eCommerce platforms: www.bevmart.com.au, www.bevmart.com, www.wiredforwine.com, and www.drummerboy.com. We launched BevMart.com.au in Australia in May 2021 and BevMart.com in the U.S. in February 2022. In November 2021, we acquired the U.S.-based www.wiredforwine.com. Drummerboy, a new non-alcoholic spirit brand, will be offered through its own DTC website. We offer our brands, as well as other brands, through our four eCommerce platforms.
